name: Sequence Master
description:
Sequence Master is a simple game, which checks and trains your attention, memory and number comparing skills.

The goal of the game is to click all numbered cells of the grid in the proper sequence, starting with the biggest one. The faster you click - the bigger score you achieve. For wrong choice you’ll receive score penalty.
With every next level size of the grid and amount of numbers increases, as well as time limit.
You’ll be able to compare and share your result with other players and your friends.
